title: Chong Hui Vegetarian
description: 崇慧素食 translates roughly to "worship wisdom vegetarian food." It's a low-key cafeteria-style eatery that opens to the street with communal seating. Offers meal plates with your choice of 4 sides, a protein, and soup. The four sides include white or multigrain rice and a variety of simply-cooked vegetables. Top that with your choice of gluten or faux meat patty. Note that the faux meat used is not vegan (dairy). Soup is self-served.
